tradingLab.title: The Trading Lab
tradingLab.subtitle: Test, validate and monitor your trading strategies
tradingLab.exercisesDesc: Practice with interactive exercises to improve your trading skills

strategyDescriptions.longCall: Buying a call option. Unlimited potential profit if the price rises, limited loss to the premium paid.
strategyDescriptions.longPut: Buying a put option. Potential profit if the price falls, limited loss to the premium paid.
strategyDescriptions.coveredCall: Holding the underlying asset and selling a call. Increases yield but limits upside potential.
strategyDescriptions.protectivePut: Holding the underlying asset and buying a put. Limits potential losses if the price drops.
strategyDescriptions.straddle: Buying a call and a put at the same strike. Profits from high volatility in either direction.
strategyDescriptions.strangle: Buying an OTM call and an OTM put. Cheaper than a straddle but requires a larger move.
strategyDescriptions.bullCallSpread: Buying an ITM call and selling an OTM call. Limited profit, reduced cost.
strategyDescriptions.bearPutSpread: Buying an ITM put and selling an OTM put. Limited profit, reduced cost.
strategyDescriptions.ironCondor: Combining a bull put spread and a bear call spread. Profits if the price stays within a range.
strategyDescriptions.butterflySpread: Combining a bull spread and a bear spread. Maximum profit if the price is exactly at the middle strike at expiration.

quizzes.title: Quizzes
quizzes.subtitle: Test your knowledge and reinforce learning with our interactive quizzes
quizzes.fundamentalsDesc: Test your knowledge of basic option concepts, terminology, and market mechanics
quizzes.pricingDesc: Challenge yourself with questions on Black-Scholes, binomial trees, and other pricing models
quizzes.greeksDesc: Measure your understanding of Delta, Gamma, Theta, Vega, and other option sensitivities
quizzes.volatilityDesc: Test your knowledge of implied volatility, volatility smiles, and volatility forecasting
quizzes.exoticDesc: Challenge yourself with questions on barrier options, Asian options, and other exotic derivatives
quizzes.strategiesDesc: Test your knowledge of spreads, straddles, collars, and other option trading strategies
quizzes.survivalDesc: Put your knowledge to the test in our timed challenge mode with increasing difficulty

hero.title: Plans & Pricing

cta.title: Start Your Learning Journey
cta.description: Join thousands of professionals mastering quantitative finance.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: After subscribing, you'll get immediate access to all the content included in your plan. You can start learning right away.
faq.answer2: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. If you upgrade, you'll be charged the prorated difference. If you downgrade, you'll receive credit towards your next billing cycle.
faq.answer3: Yes, our Free plan gives you access to core content so you can experience our platform before subscribing.
faq.answer4: If you're not satisfied with your subscription, contact us within 14 days of purchase for a full refund.

payoff.title: Payoff Visualizer
payoff.description: Build and analyze complex option strategies with real-time visualization.
payoff.infoDescription: Add option positions (calls and puts) using the + button in the Positions tab. Modify market parameters to see their impact on price and Greeks. The payoff chart shows profit/loss at maturity as a function of the underlying price.
